content:
Hi everyone, Is anyone else having issues with running their python scripts on the CGD machines? I had a script that was running yesterday and isn't today and I'm getting a segmentation that looks like the attached. [Screenshot-from-2021-08-31-09-30-05.png].
I'm trying to work out whether I have done something or whether it could be related to the systems updates this morning.
Thanks! (https://zulip2.cloud.ucar.edu/user_uploads/2/b4/5Nj6rBGT6sAMUn0-ZQ8uvFsZ/Screenshot-from-2021-08-31-09-30-05.png)
never mind - Joseph solved my problem. There wasn't any space left on our project space.
